Radistor had split up just in time to avoid this, and they didn't even noti=
ce Aerotaur as they argued with their so-called leader, Airbomber. Train Wr=
eck changed to train mode.

Train Wreck: Shouldn't we go before someone lik=
e Aerotaur decides to attack us again?...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, Jul=
y 15, 2001 2:00 PM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  OOC: I think I forgot to tell a=
nyone I was leaving last week...  Oh well...

  ::Aerotaur::
      He stand=
s motionless watching the battle.  He witnesses Sarge's death and 
  the ar=
rival of the Vile Force.  He sees Gemini Dragon.  He sees Radistor 
  form.=
  He does not move.  His mind is filled with hatred.  His thoughts cloud 
 =
 as he decides to go after Radistor where he believes Deemos is.  He takes =

  flight and in midair separates the two halves of his bladed staff.  He t=
ries 
  to drive the energy blades into Radistor's back.

f Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
